abstract: Those canvassing for Hillary Clinton in Iowa face frigid temperatures, rejection, indecision and outright hostility as they carry out thankless job; door-to-door canvassing remains, nevertheless, one of most effective ways to turn out vote.
lead_paragraph: Cindy Pollard, a star canvasser in Newton, has so far knocked on 1,500 doors in a quest to gather support for the Clinton campaign in a town where the reaction ranges from enthusiastic to hostile.

headline.main: Chasing Votes for Hillary Clinton Among Iowa’s Undecided and Indifferent
headline.print_headline: In the Cold, Chasing Votes for Clinton Among the Undecided and Indifferent

snippet: Cindy Pollard, a star canvasser in Newton, has so far knocked on 1,500 doors in a quest to gather support for the Clinton campaign in a town where the reaction ranges from enthusiastic to hostile.
